name: Staring Contest
text: When you Special Summon a monster to the Extra Monster Zone: You can target 1 monster in your opponent's Main Monster Zone; move that target to their zone in the same column as that Extra Monster Zone monster. When your opponent Special Summons a monster to the Extra Monster Zone: You can target 1 monster in your Main Monster Zone; move that target to your zone in the same column as that Extra Monster Zone monster. These effects cannot be activated in the Damage Step.
